oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hallelujah!" cast and other personnel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; African Americans; Woodruff, Georgia; film; Couch, Robert; Dickerson, Milton;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cast and other personnel from "Hallelujah!" Ms. Woodruff is on the back row, left. Robert "Bones" Couch is seated first row, far right. Milton Dickerson is seated first row, far left.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
